chat_history.message: Hello, My product iPhone 12 has the above problem: The package has not been delivered for a week and it seems like it's also no longer expected. Will the already paid amount be refunded or a replacement delivered? Thank you very much for your help,

Hello!

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. 

We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customer's ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.

Once all the paperwork has been gathered, we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. 

The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents.

If at any point the delivery begins to move again, a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Libania - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
AS

Dear Backcare,

We have informed our logsitics partner about the issue and we will update you accordingly. In the meantime, please request for the customer's ID and handwritten CND with IMEI.

Regards,
TB

Hello!

The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. 
Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 24 hours or this order will be refunded

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,
Libania - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

No, not all documents have been provided yet. Please assist the customer in filling up the CND. Friendly reminder that this CND must be printed out and handwritten and should include the IMEI as well. Thank you.

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile

You'll find the certificate in the details. 

Only the signature has to be handwritten. 

The certificate is filled in correctly. 

Regards,
Libania from the Back Care Team

Hello ecomobile,

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we have refunded €354.48 to the customer for not having met the deadlines. 


Kind regards, Libania from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, the investigation process is taking longer than we had anticipated, we are truly sorry for the delay. Can we check if you have refunded the customer yet.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

The courier needs the email address of the customer. Please assist us in attaining this information.

Regards,
RK
